preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry container, accurately measure 32.00 g of oxygen gas and set aside. 
 2. Measure 218.00 g of lead and place it in a high-temperature resistant mixing bowl. 
 3. Add 104.00 g of scandium to the lead.
